TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataList Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataList abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 用作数据列表控件的抽象基类，如 和 。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for data listing controls, such as and .

summary.span: 此类提供由所有数据列表控件公用的方法和属性。

span.span: This class provides the methods and properties common to all data listing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供所有数据列表控件（例如和）的通用功能 。The class provides the common functionality for all data listing controls, such as and . 数据列表控件用于显示数据源（例如控件）中的记录 。A data listing control is used to display the records from a data source, such as a control. 每个数据列表控件都可以具有唯一的显示样式和功能。Each data listing control can have a unique display style and capabilities. 由于 类是抽象的，因此不会直接创建此类的实例。Because the class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly. 相反，数据列表控件将继承此类中所有数据列表控件所共有的方法和属性。Instead, data listing controls inherit the methods and properties common to all data listing controls from this class. 通过设置此类的某些属性，可以控制数据列表控件的外观。You can control the appearance of a data listing control by setting certain properties of this class. 若要确定数据列表控件的单元格之间的间距量，请设置 属性。To determine the amount of spacing between the cells of a data listing control, set the property. 若要确定单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距，请设置 属性。To determine the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, set the property. 通过设置属性，可以在数据列表控件的各个单元格之间显示边框 。You can display the border between the individual cells of a data listing control by setting the property. 数据列表控件的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式由 属性控制。The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a data listing control is controlled by the property. 类提供两个属性以支持数据绑定。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到实现接口的任何集合 (例如 或 ) 或 接口，请使用 属性来指定数据源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as or ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 设置 属性时，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 若要自动将数据列表控件绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源，请使用 属性，并将其值设置为 要使用的数据源控件的属性。To automatically bind a data listing control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 设置 属性时，数据列表控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此，无需显式调用 方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 如果由属性指定的数据源 包含多个数据源，请使用 属性指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果具有 包含多个表的对象，则必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用 方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 类包含一个 集合，该集合存储每个记录的键字段 (在数据列表控件中显示为行) 。The class contains a collection that stores the key field of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 这样，便可以在不显示控件的情况下，用数据列表控件来存储键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. Key 字段通常用作更新查询字符串的一部分，用于修改数据源中的特定记录。The key field is commonly used as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 集合使用属性所指定的字段中的值进行填充 。The collection is filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 类提供 当控件中的选定项发生更改时引发的事件。The class provides a event that is raised when the selected item in the control changes. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序，该处理程序在引发事件时执行一组特定的指令。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised.

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写下面的成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

summary.span: 获取或设置要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control. 指定的文本为辅助技术设备提供控件说明。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the control. 若要指定控件中 HTML 标题元素的对齐方式，请使用 属性。To specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in the control, use the property. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性 。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置标题元素的对齐方式。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|标题元素和表的顶部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|标题元素和表的底部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|Caption 元素与表的左边缘对齐。The caption element is aligned with the left edge of the table.| |`Right`|Caption 元素与表的右边缘对齐。The caption element is aligned with the right edge of the table.| 使用 属性指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

.property instance int32 CellPadding

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 数据列表控件的同一列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元宽度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果一个单元格的内容长于同一列中其他单元格的内容，则填充量将应用于最宽的单元格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 列中的所有其他单元格也设置为此单元格宽度。All other cells in the column are also set to this cell width. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 填充量适用于行中最高单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 该行中的所有其他单元格都设置为此单元格高度。All other cells in the row are set to this cell height. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 单元格间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制数据列表控件中相邻单元格之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 此间距同时应用于垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 单元格间距对于整个数据列表控件是统一的。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data listing control. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为大于的值 `0` ，并将 属性设置为显示单元格边框的值，则相邻单元格的边框之间将显示一个间隙。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在这种情况下， 属性控制间隔大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定相邻单元格之间的间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between adjacent cells. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象，它包含数据列表控件中的子控件的集合。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

value.span: ，它包含数据列表控件中的子控件的集合。

span.span: A that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合来管理数据列表控件中包含的子控件。Use the collection to manage the child controls contained in a data listing control. 可以添加控件、移除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls, remove controls, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将控件添加到 集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a control to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/CS/basedatalistcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/VB/basedatalistcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将控件及其所有子控件绑定到指定的数据源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将属性指定的数据源绑定 到数据列表控件。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the data listing control. 通过将数据源绑定到数据列表控件，数据源中的信息将显示在 "数据列表" 控件中。By binding the data source to a data listing control, the information in the data source is displayed in a data listing control. 在 数据源中的信息更新后，该方法通常还用于同步数据源和数据列表控件。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 这允许在数据源中进行任何更改，也可以在数据列表控件中进行更新。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果数据列表控件的数据源是由属性指定的 ，则无需调用 方法。If the data source for the data listing control is specified by the property, you do not need to call the method. ASP.NET 自动调用此方法，以将指定的数据源控件绑定到数据列表控件。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the data listing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 数据源绑定到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to bind a data source to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 属性指定的数据源中的键字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the key field in the data source specified by the property.

value.span: 指定的数据源中的键字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the key field in the data source specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定由属性指示的数据源中的键字段 。Use the property to specify the key field in the data source indicated by the property. 指定的字段用于填充 集合。The specified field is used to populate the collection. 这样，便可以在不显示控件的情况下，用数据列表控件来存储键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 在事件的处理程序中（如或），通常使用 key 字段 `ItemCommand` `DeleteCommand` 来修改数据源中的特定记录。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. Key 字段有助于更新查询字符串标识要修改的相应记录。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定数据源的键字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the key field for the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象，它存储数据列表控件中每个记录的键值。

span.span: Gets a object that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

value.span: ，它存储数据列表控件中每个记录的键值。

span.span: A that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合可以访问在数据列表控件中显示为行) (每个记录的键值。Use the collection to access the key values of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 这样，便可以在不显示控件的情况下，用数据列表控件来存储键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 此集合使用属性所指定的字段中的值自动填充 。This collection is automatically filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 在事件的处理程序中（如或），通常使用 key 字段 `ItemCommand` `DeleteCommand` 来修改数据源中的特定记录。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. Key 字段有助于更新查询字符串标识要修改的相应记录。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 有关使用 ASP.NET 访问数据的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information on accessing data with ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定要删除的记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the key field for the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置多成员数据源中要绑定到数据列表控件的特定数据成员。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific data member in a multimember data source to bind to a data listing control.

value.span: 多成员数据源中的数据成员。

span.span: A data member from a multimember data source.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定多成员数据源中要绑定到列表控件的成员。Use the property to specify a member from a multimember data source to bind to the list control. 例如，如果在属性中指定了多个表的数据源 ，请使用 属性指定要绑定到数据列表控件的表。For example, if you have a data source with more than one table specified in the property, use the property to specify which table to bind to a data listing control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 对象中要绑定到控件的表 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which table in a object to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/CS/basedatalistdatamembercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/VB/basedatalistdatamembervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置源，该源包含用于填充控件中的项的值列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the source containing a list of values used to populate the items within the control.

value.span: 一个 或 ，包含用于为此控件提供数据的值集合。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要绑定到数据列表控件的值的源。Use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 数据源必须是实现 接口 (如 、或) 的集合，或者是 绑定到从类派生的控件的接口 。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 设置 属性时，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果由属性指定的数据源 包含多个数据源，请使用 属性指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果具有 包含多个表的对象，则必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用 方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，可以使用 属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 设置 属性时，数据列表控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码 。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果为 属性和属性指定值 ，ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源，并 引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要绑定到控件的数据源 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the property and the property.
The data source is of an invalid type.

exception.span: 数据源必须为 ，或者实现 或 接口。

span.span: The data source must be or implement either the or the interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源控件的 属性，数据列表控件应使用它来检索其数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source.

value.span: 分配给数据源控件的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问数据 源控件的属性，数据列表控件应使用该属性检索其数据源。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source. 属性引用的数据源控件 可以是实现该接口的任何控件 。The data source control referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 数据源控件必须与引用它的数据列表控件在相同的命名容器中，或位于数据列表控件的父控件中。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the data listing control that references it, or in a parent control of the data listing control. 为此属性指定值时，数据列表控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for this property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码 。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，可以使用 属性指定要绑定到数据列表控件的值的源。Alternately, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 数据源必须是实现接口的集合 (如 、 或 ) 或 接口绑定到从类派生的控件 。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 设置 属性时，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果为 属性和属性指定值 ，ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源，并 引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

exception.span: 无法解析数据源，因为对 属性和 属性指定了同一个值。

span.span: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the property and the property.

summary.span: 验证数据列表控件是否需要数据绑定，并验证在调用 方法前是否指定了有效的数据源控件。

span.span: Verifies that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为属性指定值时 ，ASP.NET 会自动将数据列表控件绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for the property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control. 当 ASP.NET 为控件执行数据绑定时，它将 首先调用方法，以验证控件尚未绑定到数据，并且为 其属性指定了实现接口的有效数据源控件 。When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the method first to verify that the control has not already been bound to data and that a valid data source control that implements the interface is specified for its property. 然后方法调用 方法。The method then calls the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed. 此属性设置为一个 枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示单元格边框。No cell border is displayed.| |`Horizontal`|仅显示数据列表控件中单元格的上边框和下边框。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| |`Vertical`|仅显示数据列表控件中单元格的左边框和右边框。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| |`Both`|显示数据列表控件中单元格的所有边框。All borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在数据绑定控件中同时显示水平和垂直网格线。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display both the horizontal and vertical gridlines in a data-bound control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/CS/basedatalistgridlinescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/VB/basedatalistgridlinesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定数据列表控件在其容器内的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container. 此属性设置为一个 枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|数据列表控件在其容器中左对齐。The data listing control is left-aligned within its container.| |`Center`|数据列表控件在其容器中居中。The data listing control is centered within its container.| |`Right`|数据列表控件在其容器中右对齐。The data listing control is right-aligned within its container.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定数据绑定控件的水平对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data-bound control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListHorizontalAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListHorizontalAlign/CS/basedatalisthorizontalaligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListHorizontalAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListHorizontalAlign/VB/basedatalisthorizontalalignvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据绑定到控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 此方法通知控件执行与其关联的任何数据绑定逻辑。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件，基础数据源已更改，控件应重新绑定并且应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 通常， 当数据源视图的属性发生更改时，将调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. `true` 当引发事件时，类将属性设置为 。The class sets the property to `true` when the event is raised. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 向服务器发送数据的数据列表控件中选择了不同的项时，将引发事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 使用 方法可以为事件创建自定义处理程序。The method allows you to create a custom handler for the event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从继承时 ，必须实现 方法为数据绑定控件准备控件层次结构。When you inherit from , you must implement the method to prepare the control hierarchy for the data-bound control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据列表控件是否需要绑定到其指定的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control needs to bind to its specified data source.

value.span: 如果该控件需要绑定到数据源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 属性来确定控件是否需要调用 方法以绑定到其指定的数据源。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次在 `set` 调用方法后，在、或属性上调用访问器 来更改数据源后 ，ASP.NET 会自动将属性的值设置 为 `true` 。Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the , the , or the property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `true`. 调用方法时，也将属性的值设置为 `true` 。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is called. `false` 调用方法后，ASP.NET 会自动将属性的值设置为 。ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method has been called.

summary.span: 在两次服务器发送之间，在数据列表控件中选择了不同的项时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 向服务器发送数据的数据列表控件中选择了不同的项时，将引发事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式为事件提供事件处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchangedvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式为事件提供事件处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据列表控件是否以可访问的格式呈现其标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 如果控件以可访问的格式呈现其标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定数据列表控件是否以可访问的格式呈现其标头。Use the property to specify whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 默认情况下，此属性的值为 `false` ，并且在单元标记和之间呈现控件的标 `` 头 `` 。By default, the value of this property is `false` and the header for the control is rendered between cell tags `` and ``. 如果此属性的值为 `true` ，则在表头单元格标记和之间呈现控件的标 `` 头 `` 。If the value of this property is `true`, the header for the control is rendered between table header cell tags `` and ``. 此外，将向 `scope="col"` 表头中添加一个属性，以指定该标题适用于列中的所有单元格。In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column. 将保留元素的默认呈现 `` ，将文本呈现为粗体并水平居中。The default rendering of the `` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally. 开发人员可以 `` 使用级联样式表 (CSS) 来覆盖元素的行为。Developers can override the behavior of the `` element using a cascading style sheet (CSS). 但是，在创建可访问的网页时，不建议使用样式表。However, requiring the use of style sheets is discouraged when creating accessible Web pages. 对于从类继承的数据列表控件（如 控件和控件）， 可以通过 声明方式或编程方式设置属性。For data listing controls, such as the control and the control, that inherit from the class, you can set the property declaratively or programmatically. 如果 以编程方式设置属性，请在将数据与方法绑定之前设置它 。If you set the property programmatically, set it before binding data with the method.
